scene_description_enriched: The image depicts two figures, a young boy and a young woman, both wearing elaborate crowns and regal attire. The boy, positioned on the left, is shown with his hands clasped in prayer, wearing a fur-trimmed cloak adorned with fleur-de-lis. The woman, to the right, also wears a crown and ornate clothing. Their portraits are rendered in a formal, frontal style, suggesting a devotional or commemorative purpose. The background is dark and nondescript, focusing attention entirely on the subjects.
